title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Service-Learning-Based Real Estate Consulting Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Analyze real estate cases using mathematical models and prepare investment feasibility reports

In 4-person teams, learners write a 5-page real estate strategy consulting report for local small businesses, propose ≥3 actionable strategies using AI tools (Google Trends, Naver Data Lab), and submit results meeting ≥4 of 5 evaluation criteria through 15-minute presentations/Q&A

Learners collect feedback from ≥3 project stakeholders via LMS collaboration tools (e.g., Moodle Workshops, Microsoft Teams), develop a feedback implementation plan within 7 days, and submit execution results per 5-item rubric
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
